data.text: #CarrFire Evacuation Orders Lifted in some areas PLEASE KEEP CURRENT ON FIRE INFO Follow road closures and evac warnings Drive slowly and yield to emergency personnel There may be smoke in the area as firefighters continue operations If at any time you feel unsafe call 911 https://t.co/J4dFFTNP78
